description:
UPDATE : 
- corrected bugs at installation 
- fasten installation


Puzzle kitchen Rush Mode is the free and light version of the acclaimed Puzzle Kitchen game, winner of the SFR Developer Contest. Contest for the 2 min Rush Mode ! 

Acclaimed by critics: "Puzzle Kitchen is one of the best looking puzzle games available for webOS" WebOSRoundUp.com "I recommend it to anyone who likes fast paced puzzles" 4/5 Straightupsimplereview Second place winner of the contest SFR Palm JTD Featured by Palm ! Description : Puzzle Kitchen is a 2D addictive puzzle game. The concept of the game : assemble identical food to score points, make combos, cook special recipees and achieve your challenges ! The more you play, the more complex and fast it become. Fully optimized for the touch screen, this exciting game is an all-new way to enjoy with your Palm ! Just sit back and match food items if you can. This unique tap-and-drag game is so simple that you can't stop playing it. Ready to savor Puzzle Kitchen ? So put on your apron and get into the kitchen ! Updates : *** v. 1.0.8 - Faster scoring, remove some bugs *** *** v. 1.0.7 - Multi player online scoring, let's the online competition begin ! Features : Discover the menu Puzzle Kitchen : - A game concept simple and catchy, but with subtlilities : Assembling food, Making Recipes, perform Combo and achieve challenges ! - A system of increased difficulty levels as you go through the game, thus making twists and suspense throughout the game ! - A funny game with long duration : Challenges to achieve and Rank On-line to save your high scores ! - A cartoon-style 2D graphics quality with an original theme : The Kitchen ! Enjoy your meal ! All Pre and Pixi devices supported
